entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southwest 40 gusting to 70 over southwestern sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
